title: Floral Blossom Earrings - A Modern Take on Nakshi Design
materials: Base metal with Rose Gold and White Gold plating
Mixed Gemstones including Navy and Pink Hues
features: Intricate floral design inspired by traditional Nakshi craftsmanship, with a modern twist using mixed gemstones. The openwork design creates a light and airy feel, while the strategically placed pearls add a touch of elegance. The floral buds are accented with pave-set CZ, adding to the overall sparkle.
colors: and Pearl White. The color palette is inspired by traditional South Indian flower garlands (Poovu Danda)
occasions: or as a statement piece for festive occasions. Can be paired with both traditional sarees and contemporary outfits.
description: This exquisite pair of earrings blends traditional South Indian design with modern aesthetics, making it a versatile addition to any jewelry collection. The vibrant gemstone colors and delicate pearl accents create a visually stunning piece, while the lightweight construction ensures comfortable wear. The floral motif symbolizes growth, beauty, and new beginnings, making it a meaningful gift for any occasion.
